casebody.data:
IN RE A.P. 2018-1587 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 8, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

This cause is pending before the court as a jurisdictional appeal. Upon review of the appeal, it appears that the case involves termination of parental rights. Accordingly, it is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that this case shall proceed according to the Rules of Practice of the Supreme Court of Ohio that pertain to cases involving termination of parental rights. Appellee's memorandum in response shall be filed within 20 days.
